subject: Relationships
title: Supply: What Narcissists Really Want
description: Learn Supply: What Narcissists Really Want in one minute.

hook.text: A narcissist doesn't want your love. They want your attention, admiration, and emotional energy. You're their supply.

buildup.text: 'Narcissistic supply' is the constant stream of validation, praise, or emotional reaction a narcissist requires.

discovery.text: Even negative attention counts. Arguments, tears, and begging all provide supply â€” proof they still control you.

twist.text: Go 'grey rock' â€” become emotionally flat â€” and the narcissist escalates, then abandons. No supply, no interest.

climax.text: You were never a partner. You were a source. Understanding this reframes the entire relationship honestly.

punchline.text: To a narcissist, you're not a partner. You're a supply source.
